text: "Then the Morning Comes" is a 1999 song by Smash Mouth and is the second single from their second studio album Astro Lounge. It went to number 11 in the United States, number 2 in Canada, number 22 in New Zealand, number 17 in Iceland and did not chart in the United Kingdom and Ireland. ==References== Category:1999 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Psychedelic pop songs Category:Smash Mouth songs
title: Then the Morning Comes
